Class ApiResponseWithNoData

Represents a response from a HTTP request which does not include data in its payload. This response includes status code, a message and a boolean value indicating whether the operation was successful or not. It also includes a helper method that can parse an error message from a json response.

Success

Gets a value indicating whether the operation was successful. The operation is considered successful if the Status Code is OK or No Content.
